product_name: McNett MiraZyme Odor Eliminator - 8 fl. oz.
long_description: Banish the funk of well-used wetsuits, drysuits, PFDs and other paddling clothing with the McNett MiraZyme(TM) Odor Eliminator. All-natural MiraZyme eliminates odor caused by mold, mildew and bacteria in clothing, footwear and gear. Biodegradable solution penetrates into the pores of fabric, rubber and even hard surfaces to eliminate odor naturally. Ideal for cleaning hundreds of items including PFDs, wetsuits, dry suits, tents, backpacks, bivy sacks, neoprene gloves and booties. Solution is mixed with water and works quickly and thoroughly with a single 5 min. application; no need for lengthy soaking. 8 fl. oz. provides approximately 16 applications.
short_description: Banish the funk of well-used wetsuits, drysuits, PFDs and other paddling clothing with the McNett MiraZyme(TM) Odor Eliminator.
